title: Dependencies Report Schema
description: Schema for the Go dependencies report generated by the dependency manager.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the report was generated (YYYY-MM-DD_HH-MM-SS).

dependencies.description: List of Go modules and their details.

Path.description: Full import path of the module (e.g., github.com/gin-gonic/gin).

Main.description: True if this is the main module or a direct dependency, false for indirect.

Indirect.description: True if this is an indirect dependency.

Dir.description: Absolute path to the module's directory on the local filesystem (optional).

GoMod.description: Path to the module's go.mod file if it exists (optional).

summary.description: A summary message about the report (e.g., 'Report generated for X dependencies.').
